import React from "react"; import { NavLink, Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Navigation({ active, toggle }) { return ( <>
  • (isActive ? "active" : "")} onClick={toggle}> Home
  • (isActive ? "active" : "")} onClick={toggle}> About us
